Vokabelliste.VokLine: Lerne Mr. Kingsley kennen. / Triff Mr. Kingsley#Meet Mr Kingsley.#Met Mr Kingsley.#Mr Kingsley meet.#Mr Kingsley meet.#Mr Kingsley see.#See Mr Kingsley.
Sagt mir eure Namen.#Tell me your names.#Your names tell me.#Say me your names#Your nemes say me.
Setz dich. Setzt euch zu mir.#Sit with me.#Sit down.#Sit you.#You ist with
Kannst du dir das merken?#Can you remember that?#Remember that you can?#Can remember you that?#That remember you can?
Wirf einen Ball.#Throw a ball.#A ball throw.#You throw a ball.#A ball you throw.
Klettere auf eunen Baum.#Climb a tree.#A tree climb.#You climb a tree.#A tree you climb.
